summary.span: 表示一個面板，支援水平捲動 中的標籤標題。

span.span: Represents a panel that supports horizontal scrolling of the tab headers in a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供所列的水平捲動中的控制項。The provides horizontal scrolling by line for controls in a . 不支援向上或向下捲動並逐頁捲動。Scrolling up or down, and scrolling by page is not supported.

value.span: 如需有關哪些因素會影響值的詳細資訊，請參閱[相依性屬性值優先順序](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md)。

span.span: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性設定父代上控制，而且會繼承由子控制項。This property is set on the parent control and is inherited by the child controls. 它用來存取上定義的視覺化樣式筆刷類別。It is used to access visual style brushes defined on the class. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|
